titles.title: No Pay for Disarray Act
No Pay for Disarray Act
To reduce the pay of Members of the House of Representatives if a Speaker is not elected on the first day of a Congress.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
No Pay for Disarray Act
This bill eliminates one day of pay for each Member of the House of Representatives for any day of a Congress during which no Speaker has been elected.
